head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SIMPSON, RITA (NEE BRACH)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SIMPSON, RITA (NEE BRACH)

block.p: SIMPSON-Rita (nee Brach). Of Ft. Lee, NJ, on October 3, 2000. Beloved wife of Henry. Devoted mother of Brach B. Simpson, Scott B. Simpson and Burt Ray Simpson. Loving grandmother of seven grandchildren. Services will be held at Mt. Moriah Cemetery, Fairview, New Jersey on Thursday, October 5, 2000 at 11 AM. For more information call ''Wien & Wien'' 1-800-322-0533.
